subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: John Farrell left Boston after the 2010 season, leaving behind  two starters who seemed ready to enter their prime. In his absence, the two — Jon Lester and Clay Buchholz — lost their way.
snippet: John Farrell left Boston after the 2010 season, leaving behind  two starters who seemed ready to enter their prime. In his absence, the two — Jon Lester and Clay Buchholz — lost their way.
